entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts and is speaking to Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student at Hogwarts who has had encounters with Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist and a dark wizard who has returned to power.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is proud of Harry Potter for his bravery in facing Voldemort.
Voldemort and Harry Potter are opponents, with Voldemort seeking to return to power.
